product_name: Fixe Hardware 50 Classic Day Hikes of the Eastern Sierra
long_description: Whether you're looking for a serious climb or an easy walk, 50 Classic Day Hikes of the Eastern Sierra describes plenty of places to enjoy the natural beauty of California's Sierra range.
